|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-TNC |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"CAS01S0B" and "S/N: 81-100850-00[ ]" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *"CAS01.00A" and "S/N: 81-100850-00[ ]" is silkscreened the back of a production board. :"AP : 20-100850-000 REV1" is silkscreened on the top. :''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'' is the presumed manufacturer. *[https://www.ebay.com/itm/AIReSpace-Remote-Edge-Access-Point-2-4GHz-5GHz-AS-1250-ABG-EXT-RE-/191880416032 ''AIReSpace AS-1250-ABG-EXT-RE'' on '''eBay'''] {{see also|Cisco AIR-LAP1510AG-A-K9}} ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== It's accessible via the unpopulated console port on the board. :Use a regular RS-232 adapter. 
   (   ) (   ) (TxD) (   )
[   ] (RxD) (GND) (   )
                          CN8
.. may be the correct pinout ====Info derived from==== {{SCollapse|boot log |
